Functions


setFileHandle:
Sets the NSFileHandle where the log output will go

Sets the NSFileHandle where the log output will go

setFileHandle

Sets the NSFileHandle where the log output will go 
- ( void ) setFileHandle:) fh;
Parameter Descriptions
fh
The NSFileHandle where you want the log output to go
